duties_responsibilities.duty: Supervise the Customer Service Representative (CSR) teams, including checking attendance and resolving conflicts.
Provide high-level customer service in the showroom and communicate professionally with customers.
Proactively assist customers and maintain catalogs and samples for easy access.
Consistently follow up on orders and commitments with customers, including tracking stock levels and ensuring timely delivery.
Identify and escalate customer issues, and partner with Sales Representatives to keep orders and account transactions up to date.
Retain up-to-date knowledge of company products and perform additional duties as required.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree or equivalent from a four-year college, or two to four years of related experience and/or training; or equivalent combination of education and experience.
